text: Thereupon Joshua with all Israel returned to the camp at Gilgal.
of the descendants of Nebo: Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel, Benaiah.

All who take refuge in the temple of Jerusalem or in any of its precincts, because of money they owe the king, or because of any other debt, shall be released, together with all the goods they possess in my kingdom.
But it shall not be so among you. Rather, whoever wishes to be great among you will be your servant;
To him all the prophets bear witness, that everyone who believes in him will receive forgiveness of sins through his name.‚Äù
